__geometry_explain.n: Number of nodes along the airfoil surface (n-1 panels) [It can be even or odd]
__geometry_explain.xmc: 2nd digit of NACA 4-digit series (location of max camber)
__geometry_explain.tmax: Last two digits of NACA 4-digit series (thickness percentage)

__flow_explain.Uinf: Freestream X-velocity [optional: null means auto-compute from Re]

__simulation_explain.epsilon: Small number for perturbation / finite differences
__simulation_explain.ncycles: Number of oscillation cycles to simulate
__simulation_explain.nsteps: Number of time steps per cycle
__simulation_explain.z: Number of points for stagnation streamline integration
